Based on the acting approval workflow, a denial from one of the approvers is enough to deny the change.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The change form fields become closed for editing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c0fb886a-1bc2-47b6-9ea5-1184f7cbb3d0/image2016-9-23%2016:57:56.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":629,\"height\":302}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Notifications are sent to the persons included to the approval list.
